me.taylorkelly.mywarp

Interface Platform


  • public interface Platform
    Represents a platform MyWarp has been adapted to run on.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.File getDataFolder()
      Gets the data-folder when running in this Platform.
      RelationalDataService getDataService()
      Gets the RelationalDataService as implemented by this Platform.
      DurationProvider getDurationProvider()
      Gets the DurationProvider as implemented by this Platform.
      EconomyService getEconomyService()
      Gets the EconomyService as implemented by this Platform.
      FeeProvider getFeeProvider()
      Gets the FeeProvider as implemented by this Platform.
      Game getGame()
      Gets the Game as implemented by this Platform.
      LimitProvider getLimitProvider()
      Gets the LimitProvider as implemented by this Platform.
      ProfileService getProfileService()
      Gets the ProfileService as implemented by this Platform.
      java.util.ResourceBundle.Control getResourceBundleControl()
      Gets the ResourceBundle.Control as implemented by this Platform.
      Settings getSettings()
      Gets the Settings as implemented by this Platform.
      TimerService getTimerService()
      Gets the TimerService as implemented by this Platform.
      void reload()
      Reloads this Platform.

    • Method Detail

      • reload

        void reload()
        Reloads this Platform. Calling this method will unload and reload all platform specific behaviors, as far as supported by the Platform.

      • getDataFolder

        java.io.File getDataFolder()
        Gets the data-folder when running in this Platform. The folder is expected to exist and be read- and writable for MyWarp.
        Returns:
        the data-folder

      • getSettings

        Settings getSettings()
        Gets the Settings as implemented by this Platform.
        Returns:
        the Settings

      • getResourceBundleControl

        java.util.ResourceBundle.Control getResourceBundleControl()
        Gets the ResourceBundle.Control as implemented by this Platform.
        Returns:
        the ResourceBundle.Control

        Game getGame()
        Gets the Game as implemented by this Platform.
        Returns:
        the Game

      • getDataService

        Gets the RelationalDataService as implemented by this Platform.
        Returns:
        the RelationalDataService

      • getProfileService

        ProfileService getProfileService()
        Gets the ProfileService as implemented by this Platform.
        Returns:
        the ProfileService

      • getEconomyService

        EconomyService getEconomyService()
        Gets the EconomyService as implemented by this Platform.
        Returns:
        the EconomyService
        Throws:
        {@code - java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException} if the Platform has no support for an economy

      • getTimerService
